content:
I haven't seen this announced yet on Zulip, so I thought I would plug it quickly.
https://www.hl7.org/events/cms/2020/01/index.cfm

This Connectathon event is now open for registration and will focus on preparing CMS stakeholders and influencers as they expand knowledge of, and access to, HL7 FHIR solutions that impact payers in the US marketplace.
Hi @Carl Anderson what track are you planning to attend?

UPDATE: The Pre-Connectathon survey for Baltimore has been posted here: https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/8HV978Q

And <aside> @Elkhan Yusubov - I'm leading the SMART Web Messaging track. Track discussion: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179159-cds-hooks/topic/January.20CMS.20Connectathon

PS> Sorry for the 'bonus' chatter here!

Quick Update: The registration for this event is now CLOSED.

Also, if you are already registered, please be sure to complete the pre-conference survey here:
https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/8HV978Q
